name: WPTRT/theme-sniffer
description: Theme Sniffer plugin which uses PHP_CodeSniffer for automatic theme checking.

scripts.post-update-cmd: rm -rf vendor/squizlabs/php_codesniffer/CodeSniffer/Standards/PHPCompatibility; cp -rp vendor/wimg/php-compatibility vendor/squizlabs/php_codesniffer/CodeSniffer/Standards/PHPCompatibility; mkdir -p src/vendor; cp -rp vendor/composer src/vendor/; cp vendor/autoload.php src/vendor/
scripts.post-install-cmd: rm -rf vendor/squizlabs/php_codesniffer/CodeSniffer/Standards/PHPCompatibility; cp -rp vendor/wimg/php-compatibility vendor/squizlabs/php_codesniffer/CodeSniffer/Standards/PHPCompatibility; mkdir -p src/vendor; cp -rp vendor/composer src/vendor/; cp vendor/autoload.php src/vendor/
